hero.badge: 6 AI Agents Working in Perfect Harmony
hero.subtitle: Orchestrate <highlight>up to 6 Claude Code terminals</highlight> in parallel — with full visibility, Git tools, per-terminal file history, and a shared MCP-powered task system.
hero.powerStatement: Build faster with less friction and zero context switching
hero.authorityLine: Built for developers who rely on AI every day. A faster, clearer way to work with multiple AI agents at once.
hero.requirements: Works with your Claude Code subscription. Requires macOS 12 or later.

stats.kanbanDesc: Tasks for you and your agents

multiTerminal.title: Multi-Terminal Control
multiTerminal.description: Control multiple AI agents across terminals

kanban.title: Task Board
kanban.description: Track and organize tasks with Kanban view

problem.titleLine1: Working with a single AI agent
problem.description: When your entire workflow depends on one AI chat or terminal, things get messy fast. Context switching, repeated prompts, lost threads, and invisible changes kill productivity.

painPoints.noView: No clear view of what the AI is editing.
painPoints.repeating: Sessions lose context and you repeat prompts.
painPoints.confidence: Hard to trust AI changes without visibility.

solution.description: CodeAgentSwarm turns Claude Code into a fully coordinated environment where up to six agents work in parallel, with total visibility over tasks, context, and file changes.

points.git: Integrated Git panel with diffs and commit context.
points.kanban: MCP-powered Kanban your agents can update.
points.mcp: MCP Marketplace: GitHub, Notion, Slack, Supabase, Brave Search, Playwright, PostgreSQL, and more.
points.fileTracking: Full file tracking so you always know what changed.

features.subtitle: A command center for parallel AI development.

multiTerminal.title: Parallel Agent Orchestration

visibility.description: Know exactly what each agent is doing.
